name: news.yahoo.co.jp
css:
@-moz-document domain("headlines.yahoo.co.jp"), domain("news.yahoo.co.jp"), domain("zasshi.yahoo.co.jp") {
#msthd,
#headerSearch,
#lrec,
.adIM_criteo,
.adSQB,
#contentsFooter, #footer,
.topicsMod .adIM,
.fdFt,
.topicsHead,
.socialMod,
.adIM,
.themeList,
.adULT,
*[id*="yads"],
.bottomLogoWrap,
#ycd-module,
#themeSticker,
#yjSLink,
.mainYdn,
*[id*="taboola-below-article-thumbnails"],
.subAnnounce,
.ynProviderInfo,
.shareSocalBtn,
.violation,
.tpcPoint_header,
.noticeMd_Re,
.notice_authorCom.tracked_mods,
#yjnFooter,
#gnavi,
#gnPri,
.commentBox header.hd.shortList,
#yComments .bd .hd,
.notice
{display:none !important;}

a
{font-weight:bold;}

#contents
{background:none;}

.topicsList_main a
{padding: 3px 0 3px 15px;}

.topicsListAllMain_block:nth-child(n+3)
{margin-top:8px;}
}
